attributes.action: Stop Transport for London's Cycle Superhighway 11 proposal for Swiss Cottage
attributes.background: Transport for London and their "Cycling Tsar" Andrew Gilligan have launched a public consultation for a catastrophically ill-designed scheme (Cycle Superhighway 11) which threatens to cause increased air pollution, traffic hell and gridlock in the Swiss Cottage / St John's Wood areas of London.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
